children.value: Once the venue, date, and time has been chosen, create an event page and promote the meetup to attract attendees.
can be a helpful resource for promoting events.
has a free ticketing system for meetups.
lets attendees stake cryptocurrency that's only returned to participants who attend the meetup.

Posting in Groups and Events in the community section of local Craigslist sites may attract more people to an event.
Local Venues to Promote Your Event
To promote an event, you will need to create an event page. An event page should contain:
A good name describes the theme, main topic, or general ethos of the talk.
A time and date that will be ideal for your target audience.
Describe the purpose for your event, the agenda, who is speaking, who is a sponsor, etc.
Add any additional information unique to your event that a potential attendee would find helpful. This will vary depending on the event.
Flex your creativity and use the
Always update the events page with any changes that might occur.
We recommend reaching out to attendees with reminders, updates, or teasers.

In addition to the main event page, we recommend broadcasting your
promotions on social media. See the MakerDAO socials above and don't forget to link to URL of the main event page.
Incentivize attendees to bring their friends along. Give prizes and create competitions for attendees to share on Facebook, Tweet, etc.
Collaborate with other Meetup organizers and run events together. Groups must be complementary.
Collect pictures and media from your event. These can be used in promotions and provide a helpful reference for other organizers and when planning events in the future.
9 top tips for starting a strong Meetup group
Want to include more resources or improve this guide?

/* @jsx mdx */ import { mdx } from '@mdx-js/react'; /* @jsx mdx */ export const _frontmatter = { "title": "Promotion Guide", "order": 5, "hideLanguageSelector": true, "keywords": "meetups, promotion, events, MakerDAO", "description": "The guide to promoting MakerDAO meetups." }; const makeShortcode = name => function MDXDefaultShortcode(props) { console.warn("Component " + name + " was not imported, exported, or provided by MDXProvider as global scope") return
}; const List = makeShortcode("List"); const Callout = makeShortcode("Callout"); const layoutProps = { _frontmatter }; const MDXLayout = "wrapper" export default function MDXContent({ components, ...props }) { return

{`Promotion Guide`}

{`Once the venue, date, and time has been chosen, create an event page and promote the meetup to attract attendees.`}

{`Event Hosting Websites`}

  • {`Meetup.com`}{` can be a helpful resource for promoting events.`}

  • {`Facebook events`}{` can be helpful for promotion.`}

  • {`Eventbrite.com`}{` has a free ticketing system for meetups.`}

  • {`Kickback.events`}{` lets attendees stake cryptocurrency that's only returned to participants who attend the meetup.`}

{`Crypto-Friendly Social Networks`}

  • {`Peepeth`}{` is essentially Twitter on a blockchain.`}

  • {`Telegram`}{` hosts public crypto meetup chat rooms.`}

  • {`WeChat`}{` hosts public crypto meetup chat rooms.`}

  • {`Twitter`}{` is the home of Crypto Twitter.`}

  • {`Craigslist`}{` Posting in Groups and Events in the community section of local Craigslist sites may attract more people to an event.`}

{`Local Venues to Promote Your Event`}

  • {`Libraries`}

  • {`Community Centers`}

  • {`College campuses`}

  • {`Co-working spaces`}

  • {`Coffee shops`}

{`Setting Up An Event Page`}

{`To promote an event, you will need to create an event page. An event page should contain:`}

  • {`Name`}

    • {`A good name describes the theme, main topic, or general ethos of the talk.`}

  • {`Time and Location`}

    • {`A time and date that will be ideal for your target audience.`}

  • {`Description`}

    • {`Describe the purpose for your event, the agenda, who is speaking, who is a sponsor, etc.`}

  • {`Details ("How to find us", etc.)`}

    • {`Add any additional information unique to your event that a potential attendee would find helpful. This will vary depending on the event.`}

  • {`A Banner`}

    • {`Flex your creativity and use the `}{`Design Files and Assets`}{` to create an attractive banner.`}

{`Some Pointers`}

  • {`Always update the events page with any changes that might occur.`}

  • {`We recommend reaching out to attendees with reminders, updates, or teasers.`}

  • {`In addition to the main event page, we recommend broadcasting your promotions on social media. See the MakerDAO socials above and don't forget to link to URL of the main event page.`}

  • {`Incentivize attendees to bring their friends along. Give prizes and create competitions for attendees to share on Facebook, Tweet, etc.`}

  • {`Collaborate with other Meetup organizers and run events together. Groups must be complementary.`}

  • {`Collect pictures and media from your event. These can be used in promotions and provide a helpful reference for other organizers and when planning events in the future.`}

{`Additional Resources`}

{`9 top tips for starting a strong Meetup group`}

{`Want to include more resources or improve this guide? `}{`Submit a pull request`}
